extendedInfo.description: SMS Recorder App helps you to silently record incoming and outgoing SMS from device without any Internet connection required. All you need to do is install this application and enter 4 digit PIN code. To View incoming and outgoing SMS, if he/she delete all SMS from Inbox or Sent box. Open application and select inbox or sentbox or  messages after the âSMS Recorder" application was installed can be viewed.Use cases of SMS Recorder:-If you want to keep an eye on incoming and outgoing SMS of your friend, children, girlfriend, and wife then install the app ones in their phone.-If he/she delete  all SMS from Inbox or Sent box then also you can see all the Inbox and Sent box SMS by installing the SMS Recorder.- If you want to check the incoming and outgoing SMS, you can just enter pin code and get the details of All SMS.How it works:- Install the app and enter 4 digit PIN code.- Silently monitor all Incoming and Outgoing SMS messages.- Login to application using PIN and you can view the All SMS information.- No Internet Connection required after app was installed.Permissions Used: 1. Receive SMS and Read SMS.Keywords: SMS, Incoming Outgoing SMS, Silently Read Incoming Outgoing SMS, Silently Store SMS , SMS Reader,SMS Recorder.

reviews.title: Crap app
reviews.comment: No way to hide the icon if I had a icon that said SMS recorder in my app menu I would surly uninstall it right away
reviews.author: greg wilson
